commit.message: fix: pkg: update license number in ``README.rst``.
fix: correct spelling mistake in comments and doc help (fixes #40) !minor

fix: ``rgb2hsl`` would produce invalid hsl triplet when red, blue, green component would be all very close to ``1.0``. (fixes #30)

Typically, saturation would shoot out of range 0.0..1.0. That could then
lead to exceptions being casts afterwards when trying to reconvert this
HSL triplet to RGB values.
new: pkg: added windows tests thanks to ``appveyor``.
chg: pkg: migrating from ``coverage`` to ``codecov`` for merged report support.
chg: pkg: update packaging files.
new: pkg: updated travis tests and separated distribution tests.
new: cosmetic changes, python refactor. !minor
fix: unexpected behavior with ``!=`` operator. (fixes #26)
fix: doc: added mention of the ``hex_l`` property. (fixes #27)
fix: doc: format description typo !minor
fix: doc: spellcheck and typo cleanup (fixes #19) !minor
fix: support for corner case 1-wide ``range_to`` color scale. (fixes #18)

fix: pkg: ``colour`` not importable after installation. (fixed #15)

This was a consequence of a missing ``module`` declaration in
``setup.cfg``. The fact that the lengthy travis tests didn't catch that
one earlier showed that they were flawed. These were corrected also.
fix: avoid casting an exception when comparing to non-``Colour`` instances. (fixes #14)

fix: dev: allow better subclassing support. (fixes #12)

Use ``try/except`` instead of checking ``__dict__``. This allows you to
create subclasses of ``colour.Color``, since ``__dict__`` is not inherited by
subclasses.
fix: pkg: update packaging files.
fix: pkg: update year in ``LICENSE``, and contributing and licence info in ``README.rst``.

new: pkg: updated package management tools.

- Added coverage check and display.
- ``./autogen.sh`` now is compatible MacOSX.
- Changes badges to new svg badges, added pypi download count
  and coverage info.
- removed ``./autogen.sh`` from ``.travis.yml`` test, as
  ``python setup.py install`` should call it automatically.
- Added local ``.gitchangelog.rc``.
- Use ``nose`` for test discovery.
- Use ``setup.cfg`` and ``d2to1`` instead of plain setup.py
- Added several packaging tests.
fix: pkg: pep8 concerns. !minor

fix: doc: cosmetic changes !minor

ReST changes, very little additions, a typo.
new: provide all missing *2* function by combination with other existing ones (fixes #13).

new: provide full access to any color name in HSL, RGB, HEX convenience instances.

Now you can call ``colour.HSL.cyan``, or ``colour.HEX.red`` for a direct encoding of
``human`` colour labels to the 3 representations.
fix: pkg: added full text of the license to remove remaining ambiguity.

fix: pkg: RST from ``README.rst`` didn\'t follow the ``CHANGELOG.rst`` section underlining convention.

This would break RST convertion of the PYPI.
fix: pkg: avoid looping in ``setup.py`` in case ``./autogen.sh`` fails.
fix: pep8 random corrections @minor
chg: dev: changed the color name structure to a hash, and created a revert hash. @refactor

fix: now using W3C color recommandation.

Was using X11 color scheme before, which is slightly different from
W3C web color specifications.

new: color names are case insensitive

The color-name structure have their names capitalized. And color names
that are made of only one word will be displayed lowercased.
